content: {"name": "The Refuge Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Whether your family is just starting out, a single parent home, or struggling through unexpected trials in life, Refuge wants to help you. \nWe offer a variety of necessities to help you through tough times. In addition to mentoring and ongoing pregnancy support, we are happy to help with maternity clothes, infant clothing, diapers, food, formula and more.\nRequest an appointment here: https://www.refugeconyers.org/request-an-appointment", "email": "", "url": "https://www.refugeconyers.org/request-an-appointment", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1307 Milstead Avenue Northeast", "address_2": null, "city": "Conyers", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30012", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.6774118, "longitude": -84.0083769}, "phones": [{"number": "(770) 922-5939", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "21:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}]}
